CustomField.description: Per Case #27860447, modified formula to [Contractual Specialist Time] field + 9 business hours (ET) which works out to be the same time but 1 Business Day later. This will need to be the [Contractual Specialist Time] field + 4 business hours (Eastern time) Case # 25025561
CustomField.formula: IF( MOD(DATEVALUE(Contractual_Specialist_Time__c)- DATE(1900, 01, 01), 7) = 4 ,Contractual_Specialist_Time__c + 3,/* For Fri*/ IF( MOD(DATEVALUE(Contractual_Specialist_Time__c)- DATE(1900, 01, 01), 7) = 5 ,DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(Contractual_Specialist_Time__c)) & " 21:00:00")+2,/* For Sat*/ IF( MOD(DATEVALUE(Contractual_Specialist_Time__c)- DATE(1900, 01, 01), 7) = 6 ,DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(Contractual_Specialist_Time__c)) & " 21:00:00")+1,/* For Sun*/ IF( MOD(DATEVALUE(Contractual_Specialist_Time__c)- DATE(1900, 01, 01), 7) < 4 ,Contractual_Specialist_Time__c + 1 /* For Mon - Thur*/ ,Contractual_Specialist_Time__c ))))
CustomField.label: Contract Review Target Time
